Title: In a Pinch
Description:
I suppose I should come clean and tell you why I had you gather that meat.

Truth is, there's a horrible beast who lives down in the Wastes. A monster who feeds on the unwary and whose pincers can snap through stone and bone like a knife through warm butter. 

Its name is Smaragthr, and the foul thing is the reason I have but one eye and my gems are cracked. I am no match for it, but you... you could enact my vengeance. 

Kill Smaragthr so the Wastes can be free!
PortraitGiverText: Deadly sharp pinchers clack with rock crushing force, but it's of Smaragthr's venomous tail that one must be most alert.
RewardText: You did it! I hope you made it hurt.
